article_title: Donald Trump's Obamacare Fix Is No Magical Cure
article_text:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Dan Friedman

twitter.description: Florida Sen. Marco Rubio scored a hit during Thursday night’s CNN debate by exposing Donald Trump’s inability to offer more than a vague talking point on his plans for replacing Obamaca...
twitter.title: Trump and Rubio’s Obamacare ‘Fix’ Has Major Flaws

article_metadata.keywords: health care, obamacare, donald trump, marco rubio, rubio, trump, health insurance, interstate competition
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Election 2016, Health Care, Obamacare, republican debate
article_metadata.description: Encouraging interstate competition for health insurance, as Trump, Rubio, and Cruz advocates, is no panacea for high health care costs.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Trump and Rubio’s Obamacare ‘Fix’ Has Major Flaws
article_metadata.news_keywords: health care, obamacare, donald trump, marco rubio, rubio, trump, health insurance, interstate competition
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Encouraging interstate competition for health insurance is not a magical cure.
